commit message:
Merge pull request #180 from epitron/master

Lightened the 'Dark blue' color so that blue nicks are visible

Add last line read marker to the ui

Closes #127

Click on main screen icon to connect

Closes #203

Add preference to sync read status with weechat

Fixes #63

Always show the last read marker line

Now shows up when you first open a buffer

Only reset read marker first time opening a buffer

If the buffer already has the last read line set when we attach, do
nothing. The only way to move the last read line is then by switching
buffers.

updated libraries to newest versions
migrated from appsherlock to appcompat
updated gradle plugin to newest version
updated travis script

Merge pull request #207 from charafau/feat/library_update

libraries update
changed big if else block to switch
added options to enable or disable changing text size with volume buttons

Backport Patterns from Android 5 for GTLD support

Fixes #193
Backport the regular expressions from android 5.0 so we can linkify
more urls correctly.
Also fix possible crash if activity can't be launched for whatever
reason

Fix crash when tap+hold on certain messages

If you tried to tap and hold to bring up the context menu for the line
immediately prior to the last read marker, the app would crash because
the view was not a textview. This fixes that.
Merge branch 'feat/volume_buttons_font_size_option' of git://github.com/charafau/weechat-android into charafau-feat/volume_buttons_font_size_option
Change wording to be a bit nicer
Merge branch 'charafau-feat/volume_buttons_font_size_option'

Add Timestamp alignment type

Fixes #202

Add new alignment type to align subsequent lines with the timestamp, not
the nickname/prefix

Add a font chooser

Also don't use non-breaking spaces, they aren't the same width as a regular
space.

Update font chooser

Now allows loading fonts from external storage directory
No longer tries to parse fonts, rather tries to instantiate them(less
fonts omitted due to bugs in this code)
No more pretty font names
Sort the list of fonts

Don't crash if font can't be found

Fall back to default instead.

renamed variables to camel case
changed gradle version to 2.4
fixed string constrains

Input validation for some preferences

Don't allow spaces for hostnames.
Fixes #218

Fix monospace font issue with Lollipop

Should hopefully resolve some issues people are having.
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/29076599/whats-happened-to-monospace-in-android-lollipop

Save proguard files from travis build

Fixes #213
fixed code after refactoring

Merge pull request #216 from charafau/feat/refactoring_variables_to_camel_case

Feat/refactoring variables to camel case

Order nicks properly

Order nicks by their prefix properly according to their 'importance'
Fixes #221
Fix default colors

Add support for custom color schemes

Add support for custom color schemes
Closes #219

Add new theme

Bring back the old color scheme weechat-android used to use.
Use not-black background for weechat-android theme
Make weechat-android the default theme

Fix issue with using default locale

With a different(non-roman numeral?) locale, the request for backlog was
not being formatted properly, resulting in weechat not giving us many
lines back. Force it to use the root locale, so that things work
properly regardless of the user's locale.

Fixes #222

Bump minsdk version to 9

Bumb the minimum android version to 2.3(Gingerbread) so that we can
properly support locales.

Be specific about hash type in certificate details

When presenting the certificate details to be verified, make known to the user *which* fingerprint is being shown.

Merge pull request #225 from zamabe/specify-hash-finger

Be specific about hash type in certificate details

move menu close up, so we can close buffer on double tap. also, update it on start

freeze support library versions

Merge branch 'master' into design

Conflicts:
weechat-android/src/main/java/com/ubergeek42/WeechatAndroid/adapters/ChatLinesAdapter.java
weechat-android/src/main/java/com/ubergeek42/WeechatAndroid/fragments/BufferFragment.java
weechat-android/src/main/java/com/ubergeek42/WeechatAndroid/service/RelayService.java

Several design consistency improvements
* use smaller font for prefs using PreferenceThemeOverlay.v14.Material on api < 21
* use our own category & preference layouts and according styles on api 10-14
* use proper padding and font size in nicklist adapter
* use AppCompatEditText in preferences and main chat

Update to travis ci's new container based builds

Should result in faster builds now. See details here:
http://docs.travis-ci.com/user/migrating-from-legacy/

Add play store nightlies

Publish nightly releases to the play store
Versioncode is now defined by number of commits on master branch
